name: Administrative director of the State
text: Effective January 1, 1989, and January 1, 1990, the salary of the administrative director of the State shall be $86,164 and $90,041 a year, respectively, and, effective July 1, 2004, and every eight years thereafter, shall be as last recommended by the executive salary commission pursuant to section 26-55, unless rejected by the legislature. [L 1965, c 223, pt of §5; Supp, §4A-4; HRS ; am L 1969, c 127, §3; am L 1975, c 58, §8; am L 1982, c 129, §1(4); am L 1986, c 128, §1(4); am L 1989, c 329, §1(4); am L 2003, c 122, §5]
